means: 发出（持续而单调的）短声，发出突突声
（火车、汽船等）咔嚓咔嚓地前进
（发动机缓慢运转时发出的）突突声

sentence.Network_en: In the distance I could hear the chug of farm machinery.
sentence.Network_cn: 离老远，我都能听到农机具的突突声。

sentence.Network_en: As the operating point crosses over the stability boundary, the chug amplitude disappears.
sentence.Network_cn: 当工作点越过稳定性边界时, 低频不稳定的振幅逐渐消失.

sentence.Network_en: Busy boasts chug and scurry about the river - racy speed boat, stolid, snorting tugs.
sentence.Network_cn: 繁忙的船只在河上鸣叫着来来往往 - --高速快艇和笨头笨脑喘着气的拖驳.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 角斗士词频分级词汇-十九级词汇_百度文库 ... chubby adj. 圆胖的,丰满的 chug n. 轧轧声 claustrophobia n. 幽闭恐怖症.
新概念第三册精解 ... ●dawdle v. 慢吞吞的动或做 ●chug v. 咔嚓咔嚓地响 ●lodge v. 提出.
宜宾学院外国语学院英语写作 &raquo; writingybu ... chirp 喳喳声 chug 发出轧轧声 Clang 叮当声.
新概念英语第三册单词总汇 - 豆丁网 ... chip 凿 257. chug 嘎嚓嘎嚓地响 258. chunk (厚)块 259.

list.abs: 《新概念英语第三册》核心... ... chug along 扑哧扑哧的向前爬行 we had not even covered half the distance 走了还不到一半路程.
One of them even chugged a glassful of the bugs to prove the point., 其中的一位科学家甚至吞下了一杯细菌来证明他们的观点.
with China's economy chugging along at 11 percent GDP , it is no wonder freight rates are strong .在中国经济保持着11％GDP增长率的情况下，运费没有理由不迅猛增长。
chronological age 实足年龄chug step 前进滑步circle 回环

entry.def: When a vehicle chugs somewhere, it goes there slowly, noisily and with difficulty.

example.ex: The train chugs down the track.

means.word_mean: 1. the dull explosive noise made by an engine

auth_sentence.content: Indeed several songs chug by placidly, hamstrung by Burnett's generic tropes.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Indeed several songs chug by placidly, hamstrung by Burnett's generic tropes.

auth_sentence.content: T. Rex's Jeepster then settles into an understated chug while Daniel emotes enigmatically.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: T. Rex's Jeepster then settles into an understated chug while Daniel emotes enigmatically.

auth_sentence.content: The showy virtuosity of previous albums was replaced by the chugga-chug riffola of Rapid Fire.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The showy virtuosity of previous albums was replaced by the chugga-chug riffola of Rapid Fire.
